org.agilej.sparkle.mvc

Interface SessionStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSessionStore, CookieBasedSessionStore, SimpleMemorySessionStore

    public interface SessionStore
    session data store. For one Sparkle application, it will only hold one SessionStore instance, so the implementation should thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object get(WebRequest request, String name)
      get session data with given name from request
      void remove(WebRequest request, String name)
      remove session data for given name in request
      void set(WebRequest request, String name, Object value)
      set the given name-value pair data to request

    • Method Detail

      • set

        void set(WebRequest request,
         String name,
         Object value)
        set the given name-value pair data to request
        Parameters:
        request - request which will store the session data
        name - data's name in session
        value - the data will stored to session

      • get

        Object get(WebRequest request,
           String name)
        get session data with given name from request
        Parameters:
        request - the request will get session data from it
        name - session data's name
        Returns:
        session data, null if not exist

      • remove

        void remove(WebRequest request,
            String name)
        remove session data for given name in request
        Parameters:
        request - the request will remove session data from it
        name - the name of data in session
